content: Write a newsletter blurb for a church email newsletter about a weekly Spiritual Living Group starting this week. SERENDIPITY - a 6 week Spiritual Living Group, a "Wednesday Night Oasis", featuring fun and creative activities to promote community, connection, joy and play. The events will be hosted by Kevin, Mary and Donna, along with several community members who will offer Fun with Oracle Cards, Zentangle, Art and Affirmations, an Open Mic Event, capped off with a Drumming Circle. The events will be in the Concordia Fellowship Hall from 6:30 to 8, beginning March 29 with the last event on May 3. Everyone is invited to join in the fun!
